name: Pool: 8 Ball Billiards
summary: "Enjoy Hundreds of amazing pool challenges - test your skills, dexterity, and determination in an epic journey through several snooker tests. Become a master and beat 220+ exciting challenges. Try different types of billiards and choose which suits you best. Test yourself in a duel with Computer AI and show who rules here. Don’t worry if you aren’t pro yet. You have a chance to improve your skills in planned training mode after which the world of billiards will be open for you.
